title: List of all Androidedittext   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidedittext   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Masked-Edittext
repoList.description: Android library contain custom realisation of EditText component for masking and formatting input text

repoList.name: emojicon
repoList.description: A library to show emoji in TextView, EditText (like WhatsApp) for Android

repoList.name: android-edittextpassword
repoList.description: AppCompatEditText extension library that allows to set a icon to show/hide the password.

repoList.name: datetimepicker-edittext
repoList.description: 📅 A set of EditTexts with built-in support for Date and TimePicker's using Fragments

repoList.name: EmojiConverter
repoList.description: Android Library for EditText

repoList.name: Google-Places-AutoComplete-EditText
repoList.description: A simple library that can connect your autocomplete edittext to Google places api

repoList.name: PinEditTextField
repoList.description: Android library for pin edit text

repoList.name: PinView
repoList.description: A PIN view library for Android. Use to enter PIN/OTP/password etc.

repoList.name: material-singleinputform
repoList.description: A single EditText instead of a classical form. Library that implements flavienlaurent's singleinputform

repoList.name: CountryCodePickerProject
repoList.description: Country Code Picker (CCP) is an android library which provides an easy way to search and select country or international phone code. Also supports Android EditText phone mask and international phone validation.
